ModMetaData.name: VFE-I2 Adjustments Patch
ModMetaData.author: Zergologist
ModMetaData.description:
This little patch changes a couple of values around, largest of them being the jelly morpher. Instead of being straight up better than an empress in terms of jelly production, it is now significantly weaker; it's only benefit is how soon it starts producing, maybe food consumption too.
This wouldn't be complete without the other patches, would it? Tendrillmoss gains a signficant buff, and, if it stays, the Silverfish is also gaining a chitin buff: 20 chitin every five days. Hope this is worth the morpher nerf!
